titleStmt.title: The vnrighteous iudge, or, Iudex cretensis, the iudge of Crete a sermon preached within the iurisdiction of the arch-deaconry of Norwich, at a generall court, in April last past, 16. 1621 / by Mr. Yonger of South-Walsham.
titleStmt.author: Yonger, William, b. 1572 or 3.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Henry Fetherstone, and are to be solde by Christopher Puntar of Norwich booke-seller,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The vnrighteous iudge: or, The iudge of Crete.
Reproductions of originals in the British Library (reel 1056) and Harvard University. Library (reel 1760).
